eheth indiyawe chithrapata dakma sarthaka wimath samaga oostreliyanu gamana kal damana owun ehi sathi pahaka kalayak enam agosthu masaye 16 wani dina dakwa bombaye wotsan hotalaye palamuwa da nawalti rangahale dewaniwa da chithrapata pradarshanaya karathi.ohu lankawata paminenne eyin pasuwaya.sestisar ge aramuna chalana chithraya wyaptha kirima bawin ohu kolambaa di da siya wyapthiya itu kala yuthuya.ee wana wita kolambaa ebandu wyaparayakata behewin ida kada thibuna waga pahadiliya.ohu lankawen pitathwa yanne eyin pasuwaya.ebawin me kalaya athulatha lankawe di da sestisar siya chithrapata pradarshanaya nokale yayi sithima apahasuya.eya salakime di hartsta palamuwa sestisar merata di chalana chithra dakmak pawathwa athi waga anumana kirima yukthi sahagathaya.1898 janawari 8 wani dina ape sinama ithihasaye wadagath dinayak wanuye harts mul warata chithrapataya mahajana pradarshanaya sadaha thabime sadhaka sahitha dinaya heyinya.
